text.autoconfig.simple-resourcify-datapa: If enabled, the game will scan the configured folder for datapacks.

The folder where Resourcify will save datapacks.
Default: datapacks

simple-resourcify-datapacks.toast.descri: The configured datapack path was invalid and has been reset to default.
